name: Haunted House (itch) (Fairy Snail Games, webik150, strnny, The Good Time Kid, svalisam)
name_original: Haunted House (itch) (Fairy Snail Games, webik150, strnny, The Good Time Kid, svalisam)
description: Three friends are freelance ghost hunters. One is navigator and uses an exorcist manual (in PDF format) to give instructions for the other two hunters in the field, to guide them. They must overcome three rituals and get information about the type of ghost that is haunting the house. Then catch him and get all the fame!
